title: Last of the Light and Forever
description: Enchanting, Heart-Warming, haunting and emotional Orchestral Music
longDescription:
Last of the Light is a collection of 7 enchanting, beautiful and heart-warming orchestral pieces. Perfect for any project that needs a soft and heartfelt soundtrack. Included in the pack are WAV [44.1kHz/16bit] versions of each track. And all the tracks included in this album are Royalty FREE!


Album Preview here

Album Playlist here


Forever is a collection of 8 haunting and beautiful orchestral pieces, with a focus on strings. Brimming with drama and emotion, these tracks are ideal for those bittersweet and cinematic moments. Included in the pack are WAV [44.1kHz/16bit] versions of each track. And all the tracks included in this album are Royalty FREE!


Album Preview here

Album Playlist here
